message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value, and I'm confident it can be a game-changer for your business. I'm willing to let it go for [insert a price slightly higher than $1500000, e.g., $1600000], but I'm open to negotiation. This is a limited-time offer, so let me know if you're interested in discussing it further.
